SEARCH
Package xyz.gmitch215.socketmc.screen

Class Toast

java.lang.Object
xyz.gmitch215.socketmc.screen.Toast
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Paramaterized
public final class Toast extends Object implements Serializable, Paramaterized
Represents a Toast Message that appears in the top right corner of the screen.
See Also:

      @NotNull public static @NotNull Toast custom(@NotNull @NotNull DrawingContext context, @NotNull @NotNull Duration duration) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Creates a custom Toast Message using the default dimensions.
      Parameters:
      context - Drawing Context to render
      duration - Display Duration
      Returns:
      Custom Toast Message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the width, height, or duration is not positive, or if the duration/context is null
